name: Megha Ranjith
readme_content:
Hi, I'm Megha!

👩‍🎓Btech student at VISAT Engineering College, Ernakulam
👩🏻‍💻Chief Executive Officer of [IEDC VISAT](https://visat.in/)
🎨Making videos about computer science, tech, productivity and more on [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCefgtpc2626NPGFskpzn41A)
🌹Currently learning about DBMS: Design, Modeling, Testing and Automation

Emotion-Recognition-with-Mediapipe-and-O.summary: Recent activities have been focused on updating the emotion.py file with multiple push events, in addition to several updates to the README.md file, indicating ongoing development and refinement of the project.

megha-ranjith.summary: The repository has seen a series of updates to its README.md file over the past two weeks, suggesting a concentrated effort to enhance the project's description, documentation, or presentation.

White-Space.summary: Activities in this repository include the creation of a new whitespace.py file and multiple updates to the README.md file, indicating the introduction of new functionality and ongoing project documentation.

Movie-Guide.summary: This repository has experienced a surge in activity with the creation of new files, WatchNext.py and recommendation.py, along with an update to the README.md file, suggesting the development of new features or enhancements to the existing project.

profile_summary: I'm Megha Ranjith, a dedicated developer with strong skills in Python, C#, and HTML, and a passion for creating innovative solutions. As a Btech student at VISAT Engineering College and CEO of IEDC VISAT, I'm committed to constant learning and growth, currently exploring DBMS design, modeling, testing, and automation. With a growing network of 3 followers and 11 public repositories, I'm excited to collaborate and contribute to the tech community.
